Šou bude divákov aj tento rok sprevádzať obľúbený herec Marek Fašiang a chýbať nebude ani ostrieľaný hospodár Martin Bagar.

programme.title: Partička
programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.title: Adela show
programme.sub-title: Talkshow Adely Banášovej
programme.desc: Talkshow Adely Banášovej

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Slimáky. Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: V dedine sa rozšíril veľmi nebezpečný škodca. Ďuro má za úlohu zbaviť sa ho. Lacko však zistí, že slimáky sa dajú trénovať.

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Bohéma. Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Chlpáči sa rozhodnú dať znovu dohromady kapelu a prizvú aj známeho rodáka - rockera Joža Sliackeho. Keď Jožo dorazí, všetci ostanú veľmi prekvapení.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Predtucha: Manželstvo Petra a Ľubice sa po rokoch dostáva do slepej uličky. Peter tuší, že ich vzťah potrebuje novú iskru, no nevie ako na to. Navyše v práci ho balí mladá kolegyňa. Ľubica sa cíti zanedbávaná a začína žiarliť. Všetkými silami chce zabrániť, aby Peter odcestoval na služobnú cestu...

programme.title: VOĽBY 2023
programme.sub-title: Víťazi volieb
programme.desc: Špeciálne volebné vysielanie na TV Markíza pokračuje! Čaká vás prvá povolebná diskusia s lídrami všetkých politických subjektov, ktoré sa dostali do parlamentu. Moderujú Zlatica Švajdová Puškárová a Michal Kovačič.

programme.title: Na telo
programme.desc: Moderátor Michal Kovačič privíta každú nedeľu dvoch hostí z radov politikov v diskusii na aktuálne témy, ktoré hýbu Slovenskom.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Dovolenka: František so Zuzanou stále tvrdia, že idú na dovolenku na luxusnú jachtu, László s Ildilkó zas na veľtrh klobás do 5-hviezdičkového hotela v Debrecíne. Čo bude robiť vo Františkovom byte počas ich neprítomnosti Františkova mamička? Prečo v oboch bytoch pristihne Milku s Gergejom v chúlostivých situáciách? Spoločnú bytovku Susedov navštívia nefalšovaní šmejdi, v Marte a mamičke však nájdu dôstojných protivníkov. Podarí sa Martin plán, aby sa najlepší kamaráti, ktorí tentoraz nešli na dovolenku spoločne, stretli na polceste medzi Debrecínom a chorvátskym pobrežím? A prečo Ildikó aj Zuzana podozrievajú svojich manželov z nevery? A čoho bude dôkazom fotka z policajného radaru v Bešeňovej?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Vtípky: František s Lászlóom sa dohodnú, že urobia nachytávky na svoje manželky. László prinesie zo škôlky cudzie dieťa a bude tvrdiť, že to je ich vlastná dcéra. František vybaví pre Zuzanu falošného kupca na zubné pasty. Milka s Gergejom sa stále pokúšajú o dieťa. Gergej sa ráno ponáhľa do Viedne, ale Milka chce, aby spolu počkali na výsledok bejbytestu. Dohodnú sa, že ho schová a pozrú si ho až večer spolu. Ostane na stole v kuchyni. Zuzana sa vyberá na stretnutie s kupcom až do Brezna. Doktor Vojtíšek chce chlapom vynahradiť dovolenku, ktorú si s Andrejkou užili na Floride. Potrebuje nafukovací bazén, ktorý László s Františkom hľadajú v Milkinom byte. Budú mať chlapi odvahu dorobením druhej čiarky na bejbyteste nachytať aj Milku? Ako zamotá nachytávky krásna kuriérka? A podarí sa dievčatám pomstiť sa chlapom za pomoci spravodajstva Televíznych novín?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Tobogány: Marta pozýva všetkých na tobogány na nové kúpalisko, ktoré otvoril jej známy. Pôjde aj Milka s Evanom. Zuzana sa dá nahovoriť. Ildikó tiež, lebo v susedstve je aj samozber čerešní a potom bude môcť napiecť svoju obľúbenú bublaninu. František kúpil stánok v parku. Bola to neodolateľná ponuka a chce rozbehnúť vlastný biznis. László je opäť urazený, lebo František ho nechce do partie. Gergejovi Marta vybavila kšeft, má zahrať na letisku hymnu na privítanie ruskej delegácie. Ako dopadne oberanie čerešní, keď lldikó trpí závratmi? Aké zážitky si dievčatá prinesú z tobogánov? Akým problémom bude čeliť František v zadĺženom bufete? A prečo Gergeja zbalia policajti, ktorí si potom prídu aj pre Martu?

programme.title: Vaši Susedia
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR. To najlepšie zo Susedov.
programme.desc: Seriál SR. To najlepšie zo Susedov.

Šesť párov vzniknutých počas prvej a druhej série obľúbenej reality šou je spolu dodnes a vytvoriť zamilovaný pár sa pokúsia aj súčasní „singles“ zo Slovenska a Česka, obyvatelia vily tretej série. Budú si nielen užívať krásne počasie a zábavné hry, ale pod dohľadom televíznych kamier budú hľadať lásku svojho života. Diváčky a diváci v „priamom prenose“ uvidia, ako sa mladí ľudia nechávajú opantať láskou, so všetkými vzostupmi a pádmi, so všetkými emóciami, ktoré tento najkrajší cit so sebou prináša. Vzniknuté páry prejdú testom pevnosti svojich vzťahov, pretože každému, kto nebude v páre alebo bude spárovaný účelovo, bude hroziť, že bude musieť šou opustiť. Víťazná dvojica získa rozprávkových 75 000 eur. Zamilované „srdiečka“ prevedie pobytom na ostrove lásky opäť hviezdna moderátorka Zorka Hejdová.

programme.title: Jama levova
programme.sub-title: Reality show SR (2023)
programme.desc: Celosvetovo úspešná podnikateľská reality šou Dragons' Den mieri na obrazovky televízie Markíza pod slovenským názvom Jama levova. V spolupráci so Slovenskou sporiteľňou ponúkne odvážnym a ambicióznym ľudom s výnimočným podnikateľským nápadom, vynálezcom a autorom revolučných myšlienok jedinečnú šancu získať významnú finančnú investíciu do ich originálnych projektov. Princíp je veľmi jednoduchý. Účastníci šou predstavia svoj nápad či existujúci biznis piatim ostrieľaným investorom, ktorými budú Tatiana Ondrejková, Milan Dubec, Igor Kolla, Juraj Fehervari a Igor Rattaj. Tí sa následne rozhodnú do tých najlepších produktov alebo služieb zainvestovať svoje vlastné peniaze a pomôžu talentovaným podnikateľom preraziť. Reality šou, aká tu ešte nebola, odprezentuje príbehy talentovaných, zručných a vynaliezavých Sloveniek a Slovákov, ktorí sa neboja zariskovať. Svoj priestor dostanú jednotlivci aj firmy so zaujímavým predmetom podnikania, s prekvapivým príbehom alebo s nezvyčajnými nápadmi.

programme.title: A Park for All Seasons (4)
programme.desc: Bruce Peninsula. The Bruce Peninsula is the largest natural landscape remaining in Southern Ontario.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries III (7)
programme.sub-title: Arc of Baringo. Eight giraffes are moved to a newly opened wildlife area on an island.
programme.desc: Arc of Baringo. Eight giraffes are moved to a newly opened wildlife area on an island.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries III (5)
programme.desc: Flight of the Pachyderms. An agitated elephant ends up in a local village and the vets need to find a helicopter immediately.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife II (8)
programme.desc: Of Beaks and Buckshot. A bald eagle needs Hope's help; a small but lethal patient keep the entire staff on their toes.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks (5)
programme.desc: Mexico's Artificial Reefs. Mexico's Yucatan Peninsula houses ships converted to artificial reefs.

programme.title: Big Cat Country (2)
programme.desc: Strength in Sisterhood. An attack leaves matriarch Ava incapacitated; Sam finds a tiny hyena cub all alone; the hyenas and the MK pride battle over a buffalo; Nathan discovers the MKs are hiding more cubs.

programme.title: Big Cat Country (3)
programme.desc: Punks on the Run. A group of four young lions search for a pride to take over on the western bank of the Luangwa River.

programme.title: Beasts of The Big Blue III (1)
programme.desc: Snares Islands; Tini He. Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea; hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.title: Shark: Beyond the Bite
programme.desc: Seven daredevil filmmakers try to capture the ultimate shark shot; see the preparation and planning that goes into achieving incredible footage.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas (11)
programme.desc: South Africa. Wildebeest battle for herd hierarchy, meerkats live the thug life, floppy fish fight it out on land and locusts give up their vegetarian ways in a frenzy of cannibalism; it all happens on the wild and wide-open landscape of South Africa.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas (12)
programme.desc: Sub Sahara. The latitudes south of the Sahara offer vastly different battlegrounds for a wide range of warriors; male giraffes swing their heads like wrecking balls, zebras boast the most powerful kick in the animal kingdom, and chimpanzee warfare is familiar.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue (6)
programme.desc: Catch Me if You Can. Amanda and Mandy try everything at their disposal to help a snared hyena; the team's plan to release a troop of 13 monkeys is halted by last-minute surgery and some crafty escapees.

programme.title: Beasts of The Big Blue III (1)
programme.desc: Snares Islands; Tini He. Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea; hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas (11)
programme.desc: South Africa. Wildebeest battle for herd hierarchy, meerkats live the thug life, floppy fish fight it out on land and locusts give up their vegetarian ways in a frenzy of cannibalism; it all happens on the wild and wide-open landscape of South Africa.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas (12)
programme.desc: Sub Sahara. The latitudes south of the Sahara offer vastly different battlegrounds for a wide range of warriors; male giraffes swing their heads like wrecking balls, zebras boast the most powerful kick in the animal kingdom, and chimpanzee warfare is familiar.

programme.title: Beasts of The Big Blue III (2)
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula; Muaupo. Setting sail for New Zealand's Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals; watching as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Beasts of The Big Blue III (3)
programme.desc: Top of the South; Te Ta. Uncovering a land of opposites atop New Zealand's South Island, where one of the world's longest sandbars attracts bar-tailed godwits and hungry pilot whales, and drowned river valleys provide a buffet for dusky dolphins and New Zealand fur seals.

programme.title: Beasts of The Big Blue III (4)
programme.desc: Te Moananui A Toi / Hauraki Gulf. Exploring New Zealand's marine reserves during a journey from the north to the deep south.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Trojan Racoons. The raccoons find a brilliant way of getting into the Mikkelsen's house without anyone noticing by getting mailed to the house inside in a cardboard box. Mike falls for it and the raccoons are free to steal whatever they want in their few minutes of freedom inside the house. The racoons skedaddle back to their lair, but instead of stealing the loot, Mercury brings back an old grandfather clock that belonged to the family's grandmother. Now Mike has to break into the raccoon's lair, retrieve the family heirloom and give the raccoons a taste of their own medicine.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Birthday Party. Mr Bean is feeling very left out when he discovers that Mrs Wicket is having a huge party downstairs and apparently he isn’t invited. Bean tries every trick in the book to sneak himself into the party – even resorting to hiding inside an enormous cake. If only he knew the real reason for the celebration.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: In The Garden. Mr Bean’s attempt to cut the grass is thwarted by a pesky root which refuses to budge. When Mr Bean breaks his spade he heads to the local Garden Centre to find a replacement. But instead of simply buying one he enters a gardening competition to win one - judged by none other than the Queen herself! Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: A Magic Day Out. Mr Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside. Irma is travelling light but Bean wants to take almost everything his owns in an enormous trunk. Arriving at the seaside Bean’s trunk gets accidentally swapped with a trunk belonging to a famous stage magician. As Bean entertains Irma pulling rabbits out of hats the angry magician arrives on the scene - and he’s not a happy bunny.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Ball Pool. Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre – bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesn’t like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: ‘Toad and Friends’, based on Kenneth Grahame’s literary classic, ‘The Wind in The Willows’, is lovingly brought to life in a brand-new animated series for 4-7 year olds in which Mole, Ratty and Toad are joined by Hedge, a young hedgehog with a zest for life.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: The Wild Wood Warblers. Badger finds an old dirty painting of the Riverbankers’ ancestors as a choir and Ratty offers to put a new choir together. Chief and Tinker won’t let him Smudge join. Only a full restoration of the painting will reveal who really was in the The Wild Wood Warblers!

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Waiting. The bugs talk about waiting for things they really want.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Disappointment. The bugs talk about times they felt disappointed.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch
programme.sub-title: Droopy Patrick. Lu feels sad when her flowery friend begins to droop.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives though play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry in New York
programme.desc: Room Service Robots / Coney Island Adventure / Scents and Sensibility / Wrecking Ball. Trouble ensues at the Hotel when a troop of robot bellhops are installed and Jerry spritzes Tom with a fetching perfume, making him catnip for canines. Tom and Jerry end up in a seaside amusement park after dark, where nightmares come true! Tom chases Jerry into an old building marked for demolition.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The Art of War. Rick's taken up painting to help him relax. Although he's warned them to stay out of his studio, Tom and Jerry inadvertently destroy his first painting. In an effort to reproduce it before he returns home, Tom and Jerry end up in a competition to prove who's the better artist. May the best Renoir win!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: From Nuts to Soup. When the Witch Sisters are brewing up their latest concoction, they discover that their stash of walnuts has disappeared. Needless to say, Jerry is enjoying the "nuts" of his labor, while Tom is sent out to gather more nuts. When Tom steals the winter's supply of nuts from a feisty flying squirrel, things go from bad to worse. Not only does the squirrel take Jerry's stash, but the irate rodent launches an attack on Tom inside the house.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Toodle Boom! Tom's planned afternoon rendezvous with Toodles goes off the tracks when the mouse-obsessed Toodles catches a glimpse of Tuffy and Jerry. Despite Tom's best efforts to keep her focus on him, her accident-prone ways force him to choose between romance and self-preservation.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: ‘Toad and Friends’, based on Kenneth Grahame’s literary classic, ‘The Wind in The Willows’, is lovingly brought to life in a brand-new animated series for 4-7 year olds in which Mole, Ratty and Toad are joined by Hedge, a young hedgehog with a zest for life.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz II
programme.desc: The Tallest Munchkin. Lion's regular rounds as King of the Forest are thrown out of whack when he meets Devin, a boy who says he's a giant Munchkin, who's been shunned by the other Munchkins. But when Dorothy and her friends convince him to embrace his uniqueness, Devin returns to Munchkinland and competes in the annual dance-a-thon to show he belongs among the Munchkins as much as anyone.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz II
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Hoverboard. Mike is impressed with Tom's hoverboard tricks and decides to try to master them to impress Iris. As soon as Tom steps out, Mike tries to get his hands on the board but the turtles have other ideas. In fact, everyone seems to want a turn on the hoverboard, including the raccoons. It's the perfect way for them to get their loot from the house to their den. Mike is going to have to step up if he wants to defeat the raccoons and get Tom's hoverboard back.

After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Superhero Bean. A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wicket’s house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: What a load of Rubbish. Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Robot. Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wicket’s flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Ice Cream. Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van. But by the time he gets to the front of the queue the ice-cream man has gone to lunch. Bean takes it upon himself to climb through in an open window and into the back of the van from where he starts to help himself. Unfortunately he soon attracts a crowd and is forced to serve a long queue of kids until all the ice cream runs out. When the ice-cream man comes back from lunch and drives away he is unaware that Bean is still hiding in the back of his van en route to the ice cream factory.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: Hot Air Toad. Toad boasts he can get to the seaside in his hot air ballon and be back in time for his grand dinner. He soon gets into trouble and crash lands in the Wild Woods. Trapped in the ropes and branches of trees, Toad is helpless to stop the weasels marching on Toad Hall.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: ‘Toad and Friends’, based on Kenneth Grahame’s literary classic, ‘The Wind in The Willows’, is lovingly brought to life in a brand-new animated series for 4-7 year olds in which Mole, Ratty and Toad are joined by Hedge, a young hedgehog with a zest for life.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Favourite Things. The bugs talk about some of their favourite things.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Birthdays. The bugs talk about birthdays.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch
programme.sub-title: Lu's New Shoes. Lu's upset when no-one seems to like her new shoes.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives though play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry in New York
programme.desc: The Great Donut Robbery / Torpedon't / Billboard Jumble / Horticulture Clash. Tom and Jerry mistake burglars' loot for a bag of donuts. Tom chases Jerry through a series of surreal billboards, Spike goes overboard trying to make up for manhandling Tom, and aquatic mayhem ensues at the park.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Tuffy's Big Adventure. When Tuffy and Tyke head out on their own big adventure into the snowy mountains during a family vacation, Tom catches the blame from Spike and Jerry for letting them go. But when all three set out on a rescue mission for the little ones, it's Tom, Jerry and Spike who'll need rescuing.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Flea Bitten. When Tom finds Butch taking a bath upstairs, he gives the alley cat the boot. Unfortunately, a ring around the tub isn't the only thing he's left behind. With the house now infested with fleas, Tom, Jerry and Spike declare war on the pesky little bloodsuckers.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Shadow Boxin'. Trouble ensues when Tom is separated from his own shadow. Having been trapped with Tom its entire life, the shadow refuses to go back to the life it once had. But when the shadow becomes a total nuisance to Tom and Jerry, they team up to shed some light on the problem!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: The Wild Wood Warblers. Badger finds an old dirty painting of the Riverbankers’ ancestors as a choir and Ratty offers to put a new choir together. Chief and Tinker won’t let him Smudge join. Only a full restoration of the painting will reveal who really was in the The Wild Wood Warblers!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz II
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Ditzy Home. Stephan upgrades the house's security system and it looks like Mike might be able to take a break from playing guard dog. The new system immediately detects when the raccoons are trying to break in and ejects from the property. Mike didn't even have to lift a paw. Unfortunately, the system works a little too well and quickly targets Mike as an intruder too. Now Mike and Freddy are on the same team trying to break in so he can defeat the errant security system and save Mercury and Fluffy who are still trapped inside.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Who's The Boss. Tom walks in and catches Mercury trying to break into in the garage. He thinks Mercury would make the cool, exciting pet he's always wanted. To Mike's horror, Tom makes him promise to make sure nothing happens to Mercury while he's at school. Mike, ever the obedient pooch, does his best but the turtles want Mercury out of the house. Mercury is making himself way too comfortable. Mike will need to use all his brainpower to kick the unwanted guest out of the house and enlists Freddy as an unlikely ally.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz II
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Wrestle Bean. Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But he’s promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match – only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Rare Bird. Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and they’re willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.sub-title: Bean's Safari. Mr Bean finds himself babysitting a baboon.
programme.desc: Join the strange but hilariously funny Mr Bean and his stuffed teddy on adventures such as avoiding an irate landlady or an evil one-eyed cat.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: A Round of Golf. Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wicket’s flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch
programme.sub-title: Down In The Grumps. Lu tries to cheer Declan up, but he doesn't want to be cheered up.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry in New York
programme.desc: Telepathic Tabby / Shoe-In / It's a Gift / Stormin' the Doorman. In an attempt to trick Tom out of food, Butch predicts the future. Jerry helps save a shoe repair shop. Tom is on a mission to keep Jerry away from the gift shop snack aisle and avoid the hotel’s energetic new doorman.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Baby Blues. While Rick and Ginger are looking after their adorable niece for the weekend, Rick jokingly puts Spike in charge of keeping the kid safe while Ginger goes to the store. Taking his new job seriously, Spike swears that nothing will happen to the baby. Naturally, this is where Tom and Jerry arrive on the scene to wreak havoc and make Spike's babysitting job quite possibly be his last!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Build-A-Beast. When Hildie and Beatie believe they've had a few of their things stolen, they employ a little magic to create Bog, the Cottage Beast. In order to prove that Bog is overkill, however, Tom and Jerry must confess to borrowing the "stolen" goods to beat up on each other.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: No Fly Zone. After Tom finally drifts off to sleep, Jerry heads for the coveted wedge of cheese in the kitchen – only to have a pesky fly get between him and his meal. Even though Jerry offers to share the cheese, the winged cheese bandit sets out to do his very best to make sure that Jerry will never enjoy that cheese – including waking up Tom!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Charity Case. Feeling bad for giving Tom's precious blanket to "Badwill," Jerry's determined to get it back. But with all the bizarre, enchanted items that have been donated over the centuries, getting anything back from Badwill is not easily done.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Toad & Friends

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Sister Sister. Glinda the Good's twin sister, Melinda the Mean, plans to displace Glinda as the most loved witch in Oz. Melinda thinks that being good can't be hard. But when each of Melinda's "good" deeds shows her true colors, Dorothy and the gang figure out there is an imposter! Now, they not only have to find Glinda, but also prove to the Munchkins that she is the true Good Witch.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Where Did You... Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wicket’s flat but her sideboard tumbles over and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realizing that it’s only his landlady’s furry hat Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vets in a desperate attempt to save his feline friend’s life.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Valuable Lessons. Mr Bean helps Mrs Wicket collect up all her money together after she witnesses a robbery. With all her cash safely locked in a bank vault Mrs Wicket suddenly finds she has a new admirer but Mr Bean doesn’t trust this smooth operator one bit. With wedding bells ringing Mr Bean races against time to solve the mystery and save Mrs Wicket…and her money.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Halloween. Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they won’t forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Bean Painting. Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. He’s so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares – with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: ‘Toad and Friends’, based on Kenneth Grahame’s literary classic, ‘The Wind in The Willows’, is lovingly brought to life in a brand-new animated series for 4-7 year olds in which Mole, Ratty and Toad are joined by Hedge, a young hedgehog with a zest for life.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: ‘Toad and Friends’, based on Kenneth Grahame’s literary classic, ‘The Wind in The Willows’, is lovingly brought to life in a brand-new animated series for 4-7 year olds in which Mole, Ratty and Toad are joined by Hedge, a young hedgehog with a zest for life.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Sadness. The bugs talk about feeling sad.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Games. The bugs talk about what games they like to play.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch
programme.sub-title: Bug Hugs. Barnaby is in the mood for hugs, but not all his friends are.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives though play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch

programme.title: Tom and Jerry in New York
programme.desc: Legendary cartoon characters Tom and Jerry hit the Big Apple, where their escapades take them on all-new thrilling adventures – uptown, downtown, and everywhere in between. With these two around, it's no wonder New York never sleeps!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Big Top Tom. After believing that Jerry has been eaten by a hungry bear cub, Tom must avoid the mama bear's wrath as he tries to retrieve his pal. Meanwhile, oblivious to Tom's plight, Jerry's enjoying the perks of circus life.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: X Marks... Not wanting to miss a marathon of their favorite TV show, Butch and Meathead give Tom a fake treasure map in exchange for a little TV time. While they try to get comfortable in Rick and Ginger's house, Tom and Jerry must figure out a way to circumvent Spike when they realize his house is sitting directly atop their riches.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Dragon Down the Holidays. Hildie sends Tom and Jerry into the woods to find a baby dragon who they befriend on their way home. But when Hildie tells them she plans on making the dragon into dinner, Tom and Jerry work together to save him.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Into the Woods. When an accident leaves Jerry wrapped head to toe in bandages and unable to take his scout troop camping, a guilt-ridden Tom decides to lead the kids into the woods himself. Stuck at home, Jerry can't help but imagine everything that could possibly go wrong.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Ball of Fire. The hot dog relish that Crooked Eddie brings to the detectives turns out to be an explosive device that Tom & Jerry must now return to the lab before it inadvertently blows up the entire city.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The "Werewolf Cactus". Lewis gets a shock when he wakes up one morning and sees all his carrots have been gobbled up overnight! To get to the bottom of it, Alice and Lewis call on the Police Card. Our two heroes accuse Dodson right off the bat: he seems to be the perfect suspect! But then discover the true culprit: a cactus that transforms into a “werewolf cactus” when night falls! And Alice and Lewis are in for a big surprise when they find out who is behind this famished creature!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Spirit of Adventure. Lewis is at the end of his rope: the Twins have set up home in his yard and have left the Cutie-Twees to their own devices, letting them wreak havoc in the poor rabbit’s house! Alice devises a stratagem to restore Twee Di and Twee Dum’s taste for adventure and travel. But little does she know they’re still recovering from their last expedition, which went seriously south!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: An Imaginary Injury. While Lewis prepares for the arrival of the Carrot-Grow Cloud (which will triple his carrot harvest), the King almost runs into him with his chariot! Luckily, the rabbit suffered more fear than pain, but the monarch is convinced he was badly affected by this accident! Wanting to do the right thing, he forces Lewis to rest and goes about pampering him. Our rabbit friend doesn’t dare contradict him. But the Carrot-Grow-Cloud is approaching, and, at this rate, the King is going to spoil everything! Alice decides to help her friend accomplish his harvesting mission and say ‘No’ to the King, without offending him…

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The King's Birthday. After discovering that the King has never celebrated his birthday, Alice and Lewis set about finding out what would make him happy. But he’s so obsessed with being a good sovereign that their job proves more difficult than expected. The problem is: his majesty is so used to helping other people at the drop of a hat and bending over backwards for them that he’s unable to do anything for himself! So our two heroes pull out all the stops to make sure the King ignores his “rescue missions” for a while so he can concentrate on finding a hobby of his own.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Mirror Madness. Wilhelmina steals Queen Ozma's Magic Mirror and becomes so infatuated with her own reflection that she gives up on all her other hobbies. The more she looks in the mirror, the bigger her reflection grows. When Dorothy tries to recover the mirror, the mirror breaks and the "Reflection Beast" is released! To stop her reflection, Wilhelmina must do something "good" and looks to Dorothy to train her in the ways of goodness.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Everything's Coming Up Poppies. It's the Poppin' Poppies Parade and while making a float for Queen Ozma, Dorothy and her friends run out of poppies. When Wilhelmina gives them some of hers, it turns out they're the Wicked Witch's enchanted sleeping poppies, and Wilhelmina is planning to steal Dorothy's Ruby Slippers when she falls asleep. Now, it's up to Tin Man and Scarecrow to get help from the Good Witch Glinda before Wilhelmina steals Dorothy's slippers and all of Oz is put to sleep forever.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: A Cut Above the Rest. Ozma is helping Dorothy get ready for the big Oz Royal Ball, where all the Royals of Oz will meet. Dorothy's worried about remembering all the proper protocol, but luckily Patchwork Girl makes a magic dress that will help her! But when Wilhelmina's monkey minions, Frank and Lyman, sabotage the dress, the animated gown wreaks havoc, starting skirmishes between the royals. How will Dorothy manage to fix the Ball and show she was born to be a princess?

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Wheelers of Fortune. Bricks are disappearing from the Yellow Brick Road. When Dorothy and her friends follow the wheel prints back to the Wheelers hideout, they find that Rustle, the biggest and baddest Wheeler, has been stealing the bricks to cover up the fact that his back wheel is broken. Dorothy brings Rustle to Smith & Tinker to fix his wheel. Overwhelmed with gratitude, Rustle helps them speedily repair the Yellow Brick Road.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: A Losing Game! The Queen and King appoint Alice and Lewis to play Kroki-kroka (a kind of mini-golf) on their behalf. But when the King is unfortunate enough to compliment the Queen on her “inability to lose,” she takes umbrage and decides to become the biggest loser of all time!! Even if it means sabotaging the match!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Abracada-Present. In order to get her confiscated skateboard back from the Queen (her aunt), Dinah must give her the “perfect gift.” Easy peasy: it just so happens that Lewis has a gift-making machine! Having said that, in order to manufacture the gift, the girl must use objects that match the Queen’s tastes. And since Dinah is in such a hurry to get her skateboard back, she neglects this fact, making the situation even worse. So much so that the Queen says she’ll keep the skateboard forever! But with Alice and Lewis’ help, Dinah learns more about her aunt, enabling her to come up with a gift the monarch really likes, and retrieve her precious skateboard as a result.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Wired. Alice decides to accompany Lewis on his trip to deliver vitamins to the Rainbow. It’s a pretty risky operation, involving climbing a very long wire, but Lewis is fearless thanks to his “balance button.” However, when he drops the button halfway, it’s panic all round! In the end, thanks to Alice, Lewis realizes that in order to accomplish his mission, he doesn’t need to recover his “balance button” after all - he merely needs to restore his self-confidence!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Lost Crown. After skidding out of control, the Queen loses her crown a little too long for comfort: as per the official rules, this deprives her de facto of her royal powers. At least now the tables can be turned: she can step into the shoes of her subjects, for once, and find out what it’s like to be a commoner. Or at least that’s what Alice is planning: unbeknownst to Lewis, she has hidden the precious crown on purpose: this little life lesson will do the Queen the world of good!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: In The Doghouse. Mike is forced to spend the day outside in his doghouse due to Grandma Mikkelsen's fur allergy. Mike makes the best of being exiled and plans to spruce the place up and invite Iris over for an outdoor picnic. But Mercury has been kicked out of his lair after a fight with his brother and decides to squat in the doghouse. Mike does everything he can to wake up the snoozing raccoon and get him out of his home. It looks like he's going to have to bring in the big guns if has any chance of evicting his unwanted guest before Iris shows up.

programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.
